meanings.definition: Used to express shock or alarm.
meanings.sent1: Yikes! That was a close call!
meanings.sent2: Yikes, I didn't see that coming!
meanings.sent3: Yikes, I almost spilled my drink!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me jump, yikes!
meanings.sent5: The loud crash outside made everyone shout 'yikes!'

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or dismay.
meanings.sent1: Yikes! I forgot my lunch at home!
meanings.sent2: Oh yikes, I can't believe I missed the bus!
meanings.sent3: Yikes, I accidentally deleted all my photos!
meanings.sent4: The magician's disappearing act left the audience saying 'yikes!'
meanings.sent5: The sudden appearance of the clown made the kids scream 'yikes!'
